Package com.soprabanking.ips.services

Class UpvotesService

java.lang.Object
com.soprabanking.ips.services.UpvotesService
@Service
public class UpvotesService
extends java.lang.Object
Class representing Upvotes Service that is responsible for providing the business logic for servicing the requests for Creation,Deletion and Retrieval of Upvotes objects from the database ,received from the UpvotesController

Upvotes Service provides a range of service methods each of which is responsible for processing various request for performing the following operations:

  1. Creating a new Upvotes on a Proposal by a User or,
  2. Deleting an existing Upvotes
  3. Determining if a User has upvoted a Proposal

Service methods invokes the respective methods of UpvotesDAO,UserDAO and ProposalDAO in order to return the required results to the UpvotesController

Author:
araghav
See Also:
Upvotes, UpvotesDAO, UserDAO, ProposalDAO, UpvotesController

  • Constructor Details

    • UpvotesService

      public UpvotesService()

  • Method Details

    • upvoteProposal

      public Upvotes upvoteProposal​(java.lang.String body) throws java.lang.Exception
      Creates and returns a new Upvotes object that is made by a particular User on a given Proposal according to the specified Request Body String containing the following:
      1. id value of the Proposal on which the Upvote has to be created,
      2. id of the User who is making an Upvote on the given Proposal and,

      This method converts the String argument representing the Request Body to a JSON request,retrieves request parameters and values from request body(in this case, id value of the Proposal,on which the upvote is being created,id of the User who is making the upvote) ,creates a new Upvotes object for the given Proposal made by the given User ,save the newly created Upvotes into the database with the help of UpvotesDAO.createUpvote(Upvotes) method of UpvotesDAO and retrieves the saved Upvotes object from the database.

      Parameters:
      body - String object representing the Request Body for creating a new Upvote on a given Proposal
      Returns:
      A newly created Upvotes object
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if the Request Body is not in the correct format or if the request parameter values are invalid or not acceptable
      See Also:
      UpvotesDAO.createUpvote(Upvotes)

    • reverseUpvote

      public void reverseUpvote​(java.lang.String body) throws java.lang.Exception
      Deletes an existing Upvotes object that is made by a particular User on a given Proposal according to the specified Request Body String containing the following:
      1. id value of the Proposal on which an existing Upvote has to be deleted,
      2. id of the User who has made an Upvote on the given Proposal and,

      This method converts the String argument representing the Request Body to a JSON request,retrieves request parameters and values from request body(in this case, id value of the Proposal,on which existing upvote is being deleted and id of the User who has made the upvote) ,deletes the given Upvotes object for the given Proposal made by the given User from the database with the help of UpvotesDAO.deleteUpvote(Upvotes) method of UpvotesDAO ,if it exists,else throws an exception.

      Parameters:
      body - String object representing the Request Body for deleting an existing upvote on a given Proposal
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if the Request Body is not in the correct format ,if the request parameter values are invalid or not acceptable or if the upvote to be deleted does not exist
      See Also:
      UpvotesDAO.createUpvote(Upvotes)

    • hasUpvoted

      public boolean hasUpvoted​(java.lang.String body) throws java.lang.Exception
      Determines if a particular User has upvoted a given Proposal according to the specified Request Body String containing the following:
      1. id value of the Proposal
      2. id of the User

      This method converts the String argument representing the Request Body to a JSON request,retrieves request parameters and values from request body(in this case, id value of the Proposal and id of the User ) ,checks if the given User has made an upvote on the given Proposal with the help of UpvotesDAO.getUpvoteforUserIdAndProposalId(Long, Long) method of UpvotesDAO

      Parameters:
      body - String object representing the Request Body for checking the existence of upvote on the given Proposal made by the specified user
      Returns:
      True,if specified User has upvoted the given Proposal and False, if the specified User has not upvoted the given Proposal
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if the Request Body is not in the correct format ,if the request parameter values are invalid or not acceptable
      See Also:
      UpvotesDAO.getUpvoteforUserIdAndProposalId(Long, Long)
